snippet.title: Into the Radius 2 - Early Access Teaser Trailer | Steam VR
snippet.description:
Into the Radius 2, the immersive VR survival shooter, is hitting Early Access on Steam this summer!
Arm yourself with realistic weapons and venture deeper into a world of surreal landscapes and deadly anomalies. Face the unknown solo or with a friend by your side.

Wishlist Into the Radius 2 on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2307350

↓↓↓Stay tuned for the latest updates↓↓↓

Discord: https://discord.gg/itr
Twitter: https://twitter.com/intotheradius
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/intotheradius/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/intotheradius_vr
Website: https://www.into-the-radius.com/itr2

#intotheradius #vr #survivalshooter #earlyaccess #steam #comingsoon
